- Flip your screen to landscape mode for a zoomed-in version. 
- Orientation can be fixed to either landscape or portrait mode in settings. 
- Change pages by swiping across the screen. 
- Tap the screen to display bookmark button, slider for switching pages, and audio controls. 
- Browse and download available translations (Menu > Get translations). 
- You can download as many translations as you want but only one translation can be active for viewing and searching. 
- Initial search implementation allows you to search the active translation via the search button. 
- Adjust translation text size to your preference via settings. 
- Tap on the bookmark button to toggle the page bookmark state. 
- You can add as many bookmarks as you'd like. 
- The application remembers the last page you were reading and re-opens it when you restart the app. 
- Remember to explore the settings.
No active translation set, set an active translation first (Settings > Set active translation) and then search again.
